tool_description: We help you advertise your sales or business and boost them and we post motivational and blogging
name: 👋 Demo Project
title: 👋 Demo Project

api_list.name: Add to Order
Create Order
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://demo-project29117.p.rapidapi.com/order/new"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "demo-project29117.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
